beliefs: I save aggressively because having a safety buffer is the fastest way to feel free and make better decisions.
I spend on experiences and people now because life is short and money is pointless if you never use it.
I invest early and consistently because long-term compounding matters more than trying to time the market.
I avoid all debt because owing money adds stress and it's too easy to lose control.
I'm fine using debt strategically, like for a home or education, as long as the interest is reasonable and I can repay it safely.
I prioritize high income even if it's stressful, because earning more gives you options and you can dial back later.
I prioritize a simpler life with lower income because time, health, and calm are worth more than extra money.
